title: Himi 395
lyrics:
M.L.
(Ko ‘Aisea 40:28-31)
1.
Kainga, ‘ā ‘o laka at
u
,
‘O tuku ho’mou ilifia;
He Takimu’a kuo a’u,
Mou lakalaka fiefia.
2.
‘Oku ‘ikai nai faingofua;
He hala tokatāmakia.
Ka tau manatu ‘a e ‘Otua:
Ko hotau mālohinga ia.
3.
Ko e tokoni ‘a Sātai
‘Oku fo’ou ma’u ai pē ia.
Tatau pē mo e ‘aneaf
i
,
‘O ‘ikai ha’ane ongosia.
4.
‘E vaivai pē ‘a mālōlō,
Si’i talavou te ne pongia:
Ku
o
pau ke faifai pea tō
He hala fakailifia.
5.
Ka ko e kāinga piki pē
Ki he ‘Otu
a
, mo lotu ma’u,
‘E puna honau laumāli
e
,
‘O hangē kuo kapakau.
6.
Fatu tangata te ne lel
e
,
‘O ‘ikai si’
i
ke ongosia;
Pea ko a’ua’u ‘e hā’el
e
,
‘O ‘ikai te ne pongingia. *
